name: KABOOM
description: A script to create explosions that move objects

useroptions.name: explosion_ratio
useroptions.description: The explosion ratio is used to determine the area of effect of each explosion if a maximum range isn't specified. The script multiplies the minimum range by this number.

useroptions.name: defaultLayerToAffect
useroptions.description: By default, the script only affects things on one layer. If an object isn't specified when calling KABOOM (like during a position based explosion), then this layer will be used.
